Description: Grants permission to retrieve the access-policy subresource set on the vault

Grants permission to retrieve the specified SSH public key, including metadata about the key

Controls permission to use the AWS KMS key to generate message authentication codes
Controls permission to get a cryptographically secure random byte string from AWS KMS

Grants permission to retrieve and decrypt the encrypted data
